title: BRIEF-Inspur Electronic Information adjusts share private placement
text:
BRIEF-Inspur Electronic Information adjusts share private placement 
Oct 16 Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co Ltd 
* Says adjusts share private placement plan, to raise up to 1 billion yuan ($157.38 million) from 2.7 billion yuan previously 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1ZHKqrx 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3540 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
